question: What's one relationship focus you'd love to nurture right now?

answers.title: Learning new things about each other’s backgrounds and personalities
Planning fun events and exciting shared activities
Opening up more about sexual needs and desires
Figuring out how well our core values match
Communicating more effectively on daily matters

question: Where do you see the biggest opportunity to grow together as a couple?

answers.title: Resolving repeated conflicts in a healthier way
Having deeper, more genuine heart-to-heart conversations
Discussing challenging or awkward subjects openly
Shaping a clearer vision for our shared future
Fostering strong trust and reliability in each other

question: Which aspect would you love to explore more deeply in your bond?

answers.title: Discovering hidden facets of each other’s stories
Opening up about comfort zones around intimacy and sex
Making day-to-day conversation more open and honest
Engaging in discussions that go beyond surface-level chats
Aligning on long-term hopes and dreams

question: When life throws curveballs, how would you like to respond as partners?

answers.title: Keeping things light with fun and shared humor
Confirming we truly understand each other’s deeper values
Resolving problems methodically before they escalate
Addressing tough or awkward topics proactively
Growing our sense of trust and reliability

question: Thinking of the next few months, what is top priority for you two?

answers.title: Uncovering more personal stories and backgrounds
Making time for playful activities and thrilling moments
Sharing overdue but difficult conversations (like finances or boundaries)
Charting out detailed plans and future goals
Deepening trust so we feel safe stepping into new phases

question: Which aspect would you love to refine to feel more fulfilled as a duo?

answers.title: Speaking openly about sexual preferences and desires
Ensuring our personalities and values truly align
Stepping up our daily communication habits
Tackling relationship issues before they get worse
Bringing more depth to our meaningful talks
